lead_paragraph: Mexico's ambassador-designate to Washington sought to downplay Donald Trump's comments on Mexico, telling a Senate confirmation hearing on Friday that Trump is simply playing politics.

headline.main: Mexican Ambassador-Designate Downplays Donald Trump Comments
headline.print_headline: Mexican Ambassador-Designate Downplays Donald Trump Comments

snippet: Mexico's ambassador-designate to Washington sought to downplay Donald Trump's comments on Mexico, telling a Senate confirmation hearing on Friday that Trump is simply playing politics....
